name: Cursed Soul
storyline: Your soul is enclosed in a house due a curse of the former owners who performed rituals. And your objective is to get the prismas to break free your soul, and scape.
summary:
Cursed Soul is an puzzle, adventure and horror game in First-Person camera. 
The game is being developed by solo developer Álvaro Rodríguez Ortiz (Wiwo) in Barcelona (Spain)
